title: Penguin: Determining Outliers
question_text: A random sample of the weights of $40\text{ Emperor penguins}$ (in pounds) is taken.  The table below displays the summary statistics. Variable N Mean Median Standard Deviation Minimum Q1 Q3 Maximum Weight 40 56.1 42.3 7.2 21.3 32.5 54.2 88.7 Using the IQR method, which conclusion can be drawn about the number of outliers in this data set?

choices.text: There are no more than 1 1 outlier.
There are no more than 2 2 outliers.
